kese ho pasu­giya 23 wanida kuda ha madhya pari­mana wyapara ha wyawa­saya sanwa­rdhana, karmantha saha sapa­yum kala­ma­na­ka­rana amathi wimal wira­wansha mahatha saha ama­thyansha lekam je. ee. ranjith maha­thage madi­hath wimen kuru­na­gala kamkaru karya­la­yedi, ehi disthrik saha­kara kamkaru koma­sa­ris em. ee. di. muna­sinha mahatha saha kaha­ta­gaha grafa­yit lanka limi­tadhi wada­ba­lana sabha­pathi ke. di. chithra­pala mahatha athulu kaha­ta­gaha grafa­yit pathale mara­nthika upa­wa­saye yedunu sewa­ka­yan piri­sak ekwa sidu­kala saka­chcha­wa­lin ana­thu­ruwa upa­wa­saya nathara kiri­mata sewa­ka­yan kata­yuthu kerini.
